body: {"success": true, "data": {"results": [{"content": "# Amazon Seller Guide - United States Marketplace ## Marketplace: US **Region**: North America **Currency**: USD **Language**: English **Marketplace ID**: ATVPDKIKX0DER ## Getting Started as a US Seller ### Registration Requirements To sell on Amazon.com, you need: - Valid US bank account or internationally chargeable credit card - Tax identification number (SSN or EIN) - Business address (can be international) - Phone number for verification ### Seller Types 1. **Individual Seller**: $0.99 per item sold + referral fees 2. **Professional Seller**: $39.99/month + referral fees ## US-Specific Regulations ### Sales Tax Collection - Required to collect sales tax in states where you have nexus - Amazon handles tax calculation and remittance in marketplace facilitator states - Use Amazon Tax Calculation Service for automated compliance ### Product Compliance - **FDA Requirements**: Food, cosmetics, medical devices - **FCC Certification**: Electronics and wireless devices - **CPSC Standards**: Children's products, toys - **Energy Star**: Energy-efficient products ## Fulfillment Options ### Fulfillment by Amazon (FBA) - US - **Warehouses**: 175+ fulfillment centers across the US - **Prime Eligibility**: Automatic Prime badge - **Storage Fees**: - Jan-Sep: $0.87/cubic foot (standard), $0.56/cubic foot (apparel) - Oct-Dec: $2.40/cubic foot (standard), $", "score": 0.5222, "location": "s3://knowledge-base-313117444016-us-west-2/documents/seller-guide-us.md", "metadata": {"x-amz-bedrock-kb-source-uri": "s3://knowledge-base-313117444016-us-west-2/documents/seller-guide-us.md", "marketplace": "US", "x-amz-bedrock-kb-data-source-id": "E2EDW4MOKC", "language": "english", "region": "north_america", "x-amz-bedrock-kb-chunk-id": "1%3A0%3AuKnkS5sBidWoWjhbsb5z", "document_type": "seller_guide"}}, {"content": "Value**: $47 - **Conversion Rate**: 10-15% (higher with Prime) - **Peak Shopping Days**: Prime Day, Black Friday, Cyber Monday ## Key Considerations ### Competition - Highly competitive marketplace - Many established sellers and brands - Differentiation through branding and quality is essential ### Returns Policy - 30-day return window standard - Electronics: Holiday returns extended - FBA handles returns automatically - FBM: You manage returns ### Seasonality - Q4 (Oct-Dec): 40% of annual sales - Back-to-School (Aug-Sep): Second peak - Prime Day (July): Major sales event - Valentine's Day, Mother's Day: Gift category spikes ## Resources for US Sellers - **Seller University**: Free training courses - **Seller Forums**: Community support - **Manage Your Experiments**: A/B testing tool - **Brand Analytics**: Market insights for Brand Registry owners - **Amazon Accelerator Program**: For high-potential sellers ## Compliance Deadlines (US) - Sales tax reporting: Monthly/quarterly based on state - 1099-K tax form: Issued by January 31 - Inventory Performance Index review: Quarterly - Long-term storage fees: February 15 and August 15 --- **Document Type**: Seller Guide **Marketplace**: US **Last Updated**: December 2025 **Version**: 2.0", "score": 0.5147, "location": "s3://knowledge-base-313117444016-us-west-2/documents/seller-guide-us.md", "metadata": {"x-amz-bedrock-kb-source-uri": "s3://knowledge-base-313117444016-us-west-2/documents/seller-guide-us.md", "marketplace": "US", "x-amz-bedrock-kb-data-source-id": "E2EDW4MOKC", "language": "english", "region": "north_america", "x-amz-bedrock-kb-chunk-id": "1%3A0%3Au6nkS5sBidWoWjhbsb5z", "document_type": "seller_guide"}}, {"content": "# Amazon Seller Guide - China Marketplace ## Marketplace: CN (Amazon.cn) **Region**: Asia Pacific **Currency**: CNY (Chinese Yuan) **Language**: Simplified Chinese **Marketplace ID**: AAHKV2X7AFYLW ## Getting Started as a CN Seller ### Registration Requirements To sell on Amazon.cn, you need: - Chinese business license (\u8425\u4e1a\u6267\u7167) - Chinese bank account - Legal representative ID card - Business registration address in China - Chinese phone number ### Seller Types 1. **Individual Seller**: Not available in CN marketplace 2. **Professional Seller**: \u00a5300/month (waived for first 3 months for new sellers) ## China-Specific Regulations ### Business License Requirements - Must have valid Chinese business entity - Business scope must include e-commerce or relevant product categories - Annual verification required ### Product Compliance - **CCC Certification** (\u4e2d\u56fd\u5f3a\u5236\u8ba4\u8bc1): Mandatory for many product categories - **China Food Safety Law**: Imported food products - **Cosmetics Registration**: NMPA approval required - **Medical Device Registration**: NMPA certification - **Customs Documentation**: For imported goods ### Import Requirements - Import license for certain categories - Customs clearance documentation - Quarantine inspection for food, health products - Origin certificates ## Fulfillment Options ### Fulfillment by Amazon (FBA) - China - **Warehouses**: 15+ fulfillment centers across major cities - Shanghai, Beijing, Guangzhou, Chengdu, Wuhan,", "score": 0.4344, "location": "s3://knowledge-base-313117444016-us-west-2/documents/seller-guide-cn.md", "metadata": {"x-amz-bedrock-kb-source-uri": "s3://knowledge-base-313117444016-us-west-2/documents/seller-guide-cn.md", "marketplace": "CN", "x-amz-bedrock-kb-data-source-id": "E2EDW4MOKC", "language": "chinese", "region": "asia_pacific", "x-amz-bedrock-kb-chunk-id": "1%3A0%3AT2bkS5sBF6DLs3_vrnPe", "document_type": "seller_guide"}}], "count": 3, "query": "What are the seller guidelines for US market?", "knowledge_base_id": "OYBA7PFNNQ"}, "timestamp": "2025-12-25T15:30:32.526921Z"}
